attributes.action: Petition to Salford City Council and Barbara Keeley MP - October/ November 2017
attributes.additional_details: We believe that Boysnope Park Golf Course is an excellent leisure facility for the local community and it has our full support.
attributes.background: We the undersigned residents of Eccles, Irlam, and Cadishead strongly oppose the proposals of Peel Holdings to build up to 1,400 houses on Boysnope Park Golf Course. It is vital that we have a green buffer zone between Addison Road/ Crossfield Road and City Airport.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning decisions are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can find out how to petition your council here: 

https://www.salford.gov.uk/your-council/have-your-say/create-a-petition/
